QuestData.Title: What a Buzzkill
QuestData.Description: What do you say? Fancy one more hunt?$b$bOne of those little flying pests has grown into a very large flying pest. Large, pristine gorm parts are hard to find in the best of times, and a smith always appreciates a challenge.$b$b<Cavina's voice drops as he leans in towards you.> Besides, I'm worried about the safety of my family and the rest of us in the grove.$b$bBring me the stinger from that big fella and I'll make it worth your while.$b$bDo we have a deal?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This large gorm has been terrorizing Glitterfall Basin.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Buzzkill's Stinger to Gormsmith Cavina.
QuestData.RewardText: Yeah, this is good gorm right here. I'll make you something special from it.
